# Ovie.dev — LLM Context

## Site Identity
- Name: Ovie.dev
- Owner: Ovie Okeh
- URL: https://ovie.dev

## About Ovie Okeh
Ovie Okeh is a full-stack developer and product designer based in the Netherlands. He builds software that solves real problems, with a focus on business applications, travel technology, and community platforms.

### Professional Background
- Full-Stack Developer at Bird (2022–2025): Built comprehensive business management applications
- Frontend Developer at Eurail (2020–2022): Built timetable and trip planner features for millions of European travelers
- Technical Writer: Published articles on LogRocket and OpenReplay covering React, Node.js, and web development

### Current Work
Building Kindling — a platform for guided, community-driven routines designed to foster personal growth through shared practices.

### Technical Expertise
- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL, REST APIs, GraphQL
- Interests: AI tools, automation, trading bots, creative coding

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- / — Homepage with projects and interests
- /about — Detailed biography and professional background
- /blog — Technical articles and thoughts
- /reading — Book collection and reviews
- /media — Movies and shows watched
- /hobbies — Creative projects, piano performances, vlogs

### Key Content
- Blog posts on web development, product design, and technology
- Book reviews covering sci-fi, philosophy, and biographies
- Personal reviews of films and shows
- Piano performance videos and creative projects
